name: Deathdash
description: Deathdash is a mobile game that features a player entering a player accidentally enters Mictlān, the underworld. He/she needs to get to the Marigold Bridge, returning to the world of reality. The primary ability a player has is to dash at enemies and destroy them once hitting a button at the correct occasion, in accordance with the music and rhythm. Once the player hit the button when the note reaches the judge line perfectly, he/she can gain fury. Once rage hits full, the player enters an invincible phase. The final goal is to clear all enemies in the map.
